name: get_sun_rise_and_sun_set_time
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool yawin_indian_astrology.
Tool description: Indian astrology API for planet positions, ascension calculations, and prediction findings, Basic tools that help in astrological calculations
API description: Fetches the sunrise and sunset times for a given date and location, optionally considering a specific timezone.

date.description: The date for which to find sunrise and sunset times in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format.

timezone.description: The timezone to consider for the sunrise and sunset times. Default is 'Asia/Calcutta'.
